Title: Digital Logic Simulator in Silverlight
Description: This project is a basic simulator for digital logic circuits. It includes a variety of gates (AND, OR, XOR, NAND, NOR, NOT), JK and D type flip-flops, a pulse generator, logic high and low levels, wires, and switches.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This project is a basic simulator for digital logic circuits. It includes a variety of gates (AND, OR, XOR, NAND, NOR, NOT), JK and D type flip-flops, a pulse generator, logic high and low levels, wires, and switches.

You can view a running version of this project here:
http://kenwatts.blogspot.com/2008/08/digital-logic-simulator-in-silverlight.html
